title: 01/13/21 DPS Hour 2 Andrea Kremer
itunes:title: 01/13/21 DPS Hour 2 Andrea Kremer
description:
Andrea Kremer joins The Dan Patrick Show to tell Dan that Mike McCarthy's playoff success is why he's the head coach in Dallas, but that he needs to win this year to keep Jerry Jones happy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
